name: Forma-1: Hungaroring
overview: A car racing game where you have to drive your car through the Hungaroring as quickly as possible. At the beginning of the game, you can set the number of opponents and rounds. Both can be defined as between zero and nine. With zero laps, you can race indefinitely, but you can do a minimum of 15 laps with your race car. The program was available for purchase in Centrum Stores for 529Ft.
